title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 43.1 - Background
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 43.1 - Background

State Regulations

Section
6-m
of the Banking

Law provides for the regulation of subprime home loans as defined in the
statute. Pursuant to the authority provided by section 302(2) of the Financial

Services Law and section
14
of the Banking

Law, the Superintendent of Financial Services is authorized to prescribe
regulations interpreting the provisions of the Banking Law, including section
6-m. This Part is issued pursuant to this authority, and it applies to all
subprime home loans as defined in the Banking Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
43.1

Adopted, New

York State Register March 19, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 11, eff. 2/19/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
